dcterms:description: NASAâ€™s C-MAPSS dataset is a well-known turbofan engine degradation simulation dataset that includes 21 sensor data with different operating conditions and fault conditions. It consists of four sub-datasets (FD001-04), each containing training and test data, where the test data includes run-to-failure data from several engines of the same type.
dcterms:title: C-MAPSS (Commercial Modular Aero-Propulsion System Simulation)
